armyRules.name: Shadow in the Warp
armyRules.abilityText: If your Army Faction is TYRANIDS, once per battle, in either player’s Command phase, if one or more units from your army with this ability are on the battlefield, you can unleash the Shadow in the Warp. When you do, each enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test. Each time an enemy unit takes such a Battle-shock test, if it is within 6" of one or more SYNAPSE units from your army, subtract 1 from that test.

armyRules.name: Synapse
armyRules.abilityText:
If your Army Faction is TYRANIDS, while a TYRANIDS unit from your army is within 6" of one or more friendly SYNAPSE models, that TYRANIDS unit is said to be within Synapse Range of that model and of your army. Walls and closed Hatchways are ignored for measuring purposes. While a TYRANIDS unit from your army is within Synapse Range of your army:
Each time that unit takes a Battle-shock test, take that test on 3D6 instead of 2D6.
Each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.

detachmentRules.name: Priority Predation
detachmentRules.abilityText: Each time an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more TYRANIDS units from your army is selected to Fall Back, after that enemy unit has made that Fall Back move, for each of those TYRANIDS units, if there are no other enemy units within Engagement Range of it, it can make a Normal move of up to 3"

enhancements.name: Monoform Predators
enhancements.abilityText: TYRANIDS models in this Detachment cannot be given Enhancements

stratagems.name: Lithe Killers
stratagems.abilityText:
WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

stratagems.name: Adrenalised Slaughter
stratagems.abilityText:
WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
TARGET One TYRANIDS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 5+, do not remove that destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: Talon-Tip Swarm
stratagems.abilityText:
WHEN: Fight phase, just after a TYRANIDS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
TARGET: That TYRANIDS unit.
EFFECT: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 3". After that move, if your unit is within range of an objective marker and no enemy units are within range of that objective marker, that objective marker is Secured by your army.

stratagems.name: Predatory Pounce
stratagems.abilityText:
WHEN: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a hatchway.
TARGET: One TYRANIDS unit from your army that is within 3" of that Hatchway and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
EFFECT: Your unit can make a Pounce move. To do so, your unit can me moved up to 3", but must end that move as close as possible to that hatchway. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

datasheet.name: Feeder Tendrils
datasheet.abilityText: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

datasheet.name: Fear of the Unseen (Aura)
datasheet.abilityText: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1. In addition, in the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if such an enemy unit is below its Starting Strength, it must take a Battle-shock test.

composition.name: Hunter Organism
composition.abilityText: This model cannot be your WARLORD

datasheet.name: Feeder Tendrils
datasheet.abilityText: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

datasheet.name: Feeder Tendrils
datasheet.abilityText: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

datasheet.name: Neural Disruption
datasheet.abilityText: In your Command phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

datasheet.name: Psychological Saboteur (Aura)
datasheet.abilityText:
While an enemy unit is within 12" of this model, if that unit is Battle-shocked:
Each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Each time a friendly TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets that unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

datasheet.name: Bounding Leap
datasheet.abilityText: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

composition.name: Rules Adaptation
composition.abilityText: HORMAGAUNTS units cannot perform the Secure Site Tactical Manoeuvre.

nonweaponGear.name: Armoured Thorax
nonweaponGear.abilityText: The bearer has a Save characteristic of 4+
